    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Implausible Purchase (Rogue)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4987) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 177 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Predictive Purchase (Rogue)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4955)

</column>

---

You can use Prescient Planner even if you have already used it after purchasing goods, and you can Interact to draw the item as a single action instead of a 2-action activity. In addition, five times per day, you can use Prescient Planner to pull out a common consumable item up to 6 levels lower than your level.
name: Implausible Purchase (Rogue)
